column1: Showing symptoms of COVID-19 or have a known exposure? Visit https://t.co/wKvbnTm360 to find a testing site near you.  Jeffco testing sites - https://t.co/fDu8vYmCJj…/List-of-Jeffco-COVID-19-Testing-Sit….  Adams County testing sites - https://t.co/r852jbz52W https://t.co/SWma0ta9Je

Whether it’s a job loss childcare issues or a looming eviction Coloradans are hurting as this pandemic continues on. Congress needs to immediately pass a COVID relief package to help our country weather this ongoing pandemic. https://t.co/RZFs1qQpU9

Millions have been infected w/ COVID-19. Many will carry the scars of their fight to survive for years to come. If Trump & McConnell’s rush to fill RBG’s SCOTUS seat is successful the protections for pre-existing conditions under the Affordable Care Act will be in jeopardy.

The President and First Lady’s COVID diagnosis while I wish them a full recovery is a perfect example of how critical it is to wear your mask and to social distance from others. Everyone needs to take this virus seriously and follow local health guidelines.
I voted for the updated Heroes Act a comprehensive package to combat COVID-19 stabilize our economy and support families workers small businesses and state and local governments. 1/2
